verses.roman:
madhya-līlāra krama ebe kari anuvāda
anuvāda kaile haya kathāra āsvāda

synonyms: madhya-līlāra krama—a chronological list of the pastimes described in the Madhya-līlā of Caitanya-caritāmṛta; ebe—now; kari—I may do; anuvāda—assessment; anuvāda kaile—by assessing in that way; haya—there is; kathāra āsvāda—tasting of all the topics.
translation: I shall now chronologically reassess the chapters of Madhya-līlā so that one can relish the transcendental features of these topics.
